data.title: La vida del idolo
data.meta_description: La vida del idolo - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text: 1. La Vida del idolo 1. Do you travel all the time? Yes, as a matter of my profession I should be traveling 2. Is it normally does before a concert? Ask God that everything goes well. 3. Do you ever visit your family? My profession does not leave much time to visit, but every time I can spend time with them. 4. Do you usually rehearse many times before a concert? Between 4 and 6 times, and you always have to be changing details so that everything goes well. 5. Have you ever ridden a horse? Yes, I did as a child. 6. Do you usually few hours sleep in the day? Whenever I have the opportunity at any time, since I'm constantly moving from one place to another, about 6 to 7 hours. 7. What is usually based to write your songs? In stories that have happened in my life and some common situations. 8. Do you work all the time? The majority of my time I'm focused on my career to excel every day.
